title: 3 and Out - Combine Behind The Scenes; Burrow/Cincy Answers; Herbert/Love Wild Card; Free Agency Dominoes
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Combine Behind The Scenes; Burrow/Cincy Answers; Herbert/Love Wild Card; Free Agency Dominoes
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff is live in Indy at the NFL Combine and gives a behind the scenes look at the crucial league business that gets done at the combine, the importance of medical evaluation, the inevitable questions Joe Burrow will face about his willingness to play for the Bengals, Tua's health questions, and why Justin Herbert and Jordan Love are the biggest wild cards of this year's draft class. He also looks at which way the biggest free agency dominoes might fall, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
